lead_paragraph: The Fed Cup final between France and defending champion Czech Republic will be on an indoor hard-court in the northeastern city of Strasbourg on Nov. 12-13.

headline.print_headline: France Picks Indoor Hard-Court for Fed Cup Final
headline.main: France Picks Indoor Hard-Court for Fed Cup Final

snippet: The Fed Cup final between France and defending champion Czech Republic will be on an indoor hard-court in the northeastern city of Strasbourg on Nov. 12-13....
